channel.title: Posts on Paul Lorsbach
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Paul Lorsbach

item.title: First Post - Last Post
item.description: prompt: what I would say to my younger self You haven’t broken free yet. You haven’t really tried, but it doesn’t work like you think it does either. Kicking down barriers, busting through the wall, and running into a the sun will feel great. But once the liberation glow wears off you’re just in an an empty field, having to build from scratch, alone. That’s not to say you won’t have adventures with storybook endings.
